downloadTitle: Azure SQL DB Audit Logs Report Template and Specification
downloadDescription: This Excel Reports Template can be used for deep analysis of Azure SQL DB Audit log data. In addition, a specification for Audit Log data is provided.

downloadFile.name: 02-Azure SQL DB Blob Audit Logs Format Specification.docx

downloadFile.name: 03-Azure SQL DB Table Audit Logs Format Specification.docx
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/d/8/d/d8d90ba1-977f-466b-a839-7823ff37fd02/03-Azure SQL DB Table Audit Logs Format Specification.docx

detailsSection:
Use the Excel template to analyze your Azure SQL DB Audit Logs for Table auditing. Audit logs data can be loaded into the Excel file using the Power Query for Excel add-in. This template may also be used as a base for creating your own customized reports on top of your Audit data.

In addition, a specification detailing the Audit log data is available for both Table and Blob auditing.

For detailed instructions on setting up and analyzing Azure SQL DB Audit Logs, please review our Get started with SQL database auditing guide.
detailsSection_file_name: 02-Azure SQL DB Blob Audit Logs Format Specification.docx
01-Azure SQL DB Audit Logs Report Template.xlsx
03-Azure SQL DB Table Audit Logs Format Specification.docx
systemRequirementsSection: • Excel 2013 with Power Query for Excel add-in (It is recommended to use the 64-bit version of Excel)
installInstructionSection: Download the Excel template and save locally, to load your audit log data.

relatedResourcesSection.title: introduction to Azure SQL DB Auditing
